title: looking for sliver league ranked team i can play adc mid and jungle well :)
body: looking for a ranked team to climb with

replies.body:
Add me in game. You seem like decent player with that cs, especially as Zed and adc.

In fact, if I may suggest, keep playing Zed and adc, unless if Zed is banned and you have to go mid.
hey man i was only able to check this today if ur still interested i just added you :)

i play top
